snippet: The estate of a young woman who was mauled to death by a cougar while working at a wild-cat sanctuary in suburban Portland is suing the sanctuary and its owners....

headline.print_headline: Estate of Keeper Killed by Cougar Sues Sanctuary
headline.main: Estate of Keeper Killed by Cougar Sues Sanctuary

lead_paragraph: The estate of a young woman who was mauled to death by a cougar while working at a wild-cat sanctuary in suburban Portland is suing the sanctuary and its owners.
